{{Character|character name = Schnoodle|ep = [[The One With The Bullies]]|name = Schnoodle|image = [[Image:Schnoodle Infobox.png|300px]]|occ = Pet|gender = Male|relatives = [[Mrs. Buffay (Frank Sr.'s second wife)]] (owner)|number = 1}}
'''Schnoodle''' is a Jack Russell terrier owned by [[Mrs. Buffay (Frank Sr.'s second wife)|Mrs. Buffay]] (Frank Sr.'s second wife).

During [[Phoebe Buffay|Phoebe]]'s second attempt to visit the home of her biological father, she is attacked by Schnoodle, who clamps onto her pant's leg and then tries to jump in the cab window. After being held at bay until nighttime, Phoebe tries to drive away, but runs over Schnoodle.  She takes Schnoodle to the vet for stitches and returns the next day with him, at which time she meets the new Mrs. Buffay and her half-brother, [[Frank Jr.]]
